description: Describes the associations between the applications and the specified image.

parameters.name: AssociatedResourceTypes
parameters.description: The resource types of the associated resource. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Associations
nested_items.description: List of information about the specified associations.

nested_items.name: AssociatedResourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the associated resource.

nested_items.name: AssociatedResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the associated resources.

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: The time the association is created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time the association status was last updated.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The status of the image resource association.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: The reason the association deployment failed.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code of the association deployment failure.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message of the association deployment failure.
